quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
You are capable of amazing things, even when you feel like everything is falling apart.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations. Keep going, even when it gets tough.
Don’t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day. Look for it, and let it guide you.
Your current situation is not your final destination. The best is yet to come.
Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you thought you couldn’t.
You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step in faith.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get back up. Resilience is your superpower.
Dream big, start small, but most of all, start. Progress begins with one brave move.
You are stronger than you think, and more capable than you ever imagined.
No matter how slow you go, you’re still lapping everyone who’s sitting still. Keep moving forward.
Let your faith be bigger than your fear. Trust the journey, even when you do not understand it.
You have the power to create the life you want. It starts with one decision to not give up.
Great things never come from comfort zones. Be brave enough to grow beyond your limits.
Challenges are what make life interesting, and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
Every setback is a setup for a comeback. Don’t be discouraged—your story isn’t over yet.
Keep your head up, your heart open, and your mind focused. You are destined for greatness.
